import Mathlib

/-- For a function f : â„‚ â†’ â„‚ and z0 : â„‚, f(z) â†’ âŠ¤ in WithTop â„‚ as z â†’ z0 iff for every M > 0
there exists a Î´ > 0 such that |f(z)| > M whenever |z - z0| < Î´. -/
theorem tendsto_withTop_iff_abs_gt (f : â„‚ â†’ â„‚) (z0 : â„‚) :
  Tendsto (fun z => (f z : WithTop â„‚)) (ğ“ z0) (ğ“ (âŠ¤ : WithTop â„‚)) â†”
  (âˆ€ M : â„, 0 < M â†’ âˆƒ Î´ : â„, 0 < Î´ âˆ§ âˆ€ z, Complex.abs (z - z0) < Î´ â†’ Complex.abs (f z) > M) := by
  sorry

import Mathlib
open Filter

/-- For a function f : â„‚ â†’ â„‚ and z0 : â„‚, f(z) â†’ âŠ¤ in WithTop â„‚ as z â†’ z0 iff for every M > 0
there exists a Î´ > 0 such that |f(z)| > M whenever |z - z0| < Î´. -/
theorem tendsto_withTop_iff_abs_gt (f : Complex â†’ Complex) (z0 : Complex) :
  Tendsto (fun z => (f z : WithTop Complex)) (ğ“ z0) (ğ“ (âŠ¤ : WithTop Complex)) â†”
  (âˆ€ M : â„, 0 < M â†’ âˆƒ Î´ : â„, 0 < Î´ âˆ§ âˆ€ z, Complex.abs (z - z0) < Î´ â†’ Complex.abs (f z) > M) := by
  sorry

import Mathlib

/-- For a function f : â„‚ â†’ â„‚ and z0 : â„‚, f(z) â†’ âŠ¤ in WithTop â„‚ as z â†’ z0 iff for every M > 0
there exists a Î´ > 0 such that |f(z)| > M whenever |z - z0| < Î´. -/
theorem tendsto_withTop_iff_abs_gt (f : Complex â†’ Complex) (z0 : Complex) :
  Filter.Tendsto (fun z => (f z : WithTop Complex)) (Filter.nhds z0) (Filter.nhds (âŠ¤ : WithTop Complex)) â†”
